about_the_game: This Demo of TrueBoxing VR enable the player to do one fight against an opponent. The fight is a 3 rounder fight. The player can choose round length, which is also setting the difficulty level. It is reccomended to start on Easy level which is 1 min round.
detailed_description: This Demo of TrueBoxing VR enable the player to do one fight against an opponent. The fight is a 3 rounder fight. The player can choose round length, which is also setting the difficulty level. It is reccomended to start on Easy level which is 1 min round.
name: True Boxing VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This Demo of TrueBoxing VR enable the player to do one fight against one opponent. The fight is a 3 rounder fight. The player can choose round length, In the update difficulty level has been removed and replaced with opponent becoming more difficult after loosing a round against the Player.
